import React from 'react'; import { Card, Modal, Button, Icon, Image, Header} from 'semantic-ui-react' import About from './about.js' import Contact from './contact.js' import ScrollableAnchor from 'react-scrollable-anchor' export default class Projects extends React.Component{ state = { open: false } show = (dimmer) => () => this.setState({ dimmer, open: true }) close = () => this.setState({ open: false }) render(){ const { open, dimmer } = this.state return(
